special_options.name: Grapple
special_options.effect: Target must succeed on STR/DEX save (DC = 8 + Prof + STR) or be grappled

special_options.name: Shove
special_options.effect: Target must succeed on STR/DEX save (DC = 8 + Prof + STR) or be pushed 5 ft or knocked prone

options.name: Emissary of Peace
options.effect: Grant yourself +5 bonus to Charisma (Persuasion) checks for 10 minutes

options.name: Rebuke the Violent
options.trigger: When an attacker within 30 ft deals damage to a creature other than you
options.effect: Force attacker to make WIS save (DC 20). On failure, takes radiant damage equal to damage dealt, half on success

actions.name: Create Pact Weapon
actions.description: Create a pact weapon in your hand or transform a magic weapon into your pact weapon
actions.effect: Weapon appears in hand, you're proficient with it, counts as magical

actions.name: Divine Sense
actions.effect: Detect celestials, fiends, undead, and consecrated/desecrated areas until end of next turn

actions.name: Extra Attack
actions.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn

effects.name: Heal
effects.effect: Restore HP equal to points spent

bonus_actions.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
bonus_actions.description: Make an off-hand attack when you use the Attack action with a light melee weapon

bonus_actions.name: Hex
bonus_actions.effect: Curse target for extra 1d6 necrotic damage and disadvantage on one ability check

bonus_actions.name: Shining Smite
bonus_actions.trigger: Immediately after hitting with melee weapon or unarmed strike
bonus_actions.effect: Deal extra 2d6 radiant damage, target sheds bright light and attacks have advantage

bonus_actions.name: Divine Word
bonus_actions.effect: Speak word of power affecting creatures based on current HP

bonus_actions.name: Channel Divinity: Emissary of Peace
bonus_actions.effect: Grant yourself +5 bonus to Charisma (Persuasion) checks for 10 minutes

bonus_actions.name: Harness Divine Power
bonus_actions.effect: Expend Channel Divinity use to regain one spell slot (max 3rd level)

bonus_actions.name: Hexblade's Curse
effects: +5 bonus to damage rolls against cursed target
Regain 12 HP when cursed target dies

reactions.name: Opportunity Attack
reactions.trigger: A hostile creature you can see moves out of your reach
reactions.effect: Make one melee attack against the triggering creature

reactions.name: Hellish Rebuke
reactions.trigger: Taking damage from a creature within 60 ft that you can see
reactions.effect: Creature takes 2d10 fire damage (DEX save for half)

reactions.name: Counterspell
reactions.trigger: See a creature within 60 ft casting a spell
reactions.effect: Attempt to interrupt the spell (CON save)

reactions.name: Aura of the Guardian
reactions.trigger: When a creature within range takes damage

reactions.name: Channel Divinity: Rebuke the Violent
reactions.trigger: Attacker deals damage to creature other than you
reactions.effect: Force WIS save (DC 20) or take radiant damage equal to damage dealt

other_actions.name: Interact with an Object
other_actions.description: Interact with one object or environmental feature

other_actions.name: Prayer of Healing
other_actions.effect: Heal up to 5 creatures for 2d8 HP

special_abilities.name: Divine Smite
special_abilities.trigger: On hit with melee weapon attack

special_abilities.name: Hex Warrior
effects: Proficiency with medium armor, shields, and martial weapons
Use CHA for attack and damage with one weapon (chosen on long rest)
Use CHA for all pact weapons
special_abilities.restrictions: Chosen weapon cannot have two-handed property

special_abilities.name: Lucky
special_abilities.trigger: When making attack roll, ability check, saving throw, or being attacked
special_abilities.effect: Roll additional d20 and choose which to use

notes: Keep in mind you can only cast one spell per turn unless you have the Extra Attack feature
Attack bonuses and save DCs are pre-calculated
Uses tracking included for limited-use abilities
Some abilities can be used as different action types
Hexblade's Curse and Hex Warrior use CHA for attacks
